name: Ball:Ball
description:
Ball: Ball is A puzzle game that requires smarts and skill get ready for you brain to be tested! You may rage but that’s ok as we believe your great anyway! Good Luck and thanks for playing.

Credits: Programmed, Developed, Produced by CCSoftware

Thanks To: KC

Music : Zap Splat Royalty Free Music

Please Report Any Bugs and Issues as it helps make a better game for everyone!

This Game Is A Submission To The CCC Jam.

Fun Facts : About 10 hrs of Oasis Songs were listened to during Dev Time!

The Idea Of this Was Thought of in a Shower...

This Is My Second Game!

And Thats It Good Luck Again :)
